articles.author: Michael Barnard
articles.title: Biden’s 100% China EV Tariff Fails History 101 - CleanTechnica
articles.description: US car firms and the USA faced an identical challenge 50 years ago from Asian firms and embraced them. So why are they rejecting cheap EVs from China?
articles.content:
